description:
Yoshidayama continues his climb to the top of the bad boy rankings, Imadori tries to touch a tomboy, and Harima tries his hand at prehistoric heroism! Back to the more recent past, a moment in the dark sheds light on an assistant’s clandestine crush.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Smile Kudasai! / Mammoth Tabetai! / Koi Shite mo Ii Desu ka?
Smile, Please! / Mammoth, Yum! / May I Fall in Love?
スマイルください! / マンモスたべたい! / 恋してもいいですか?
